summary: It\'s a config based on the ENB 102 and try to get as would be the next generation in Skyrim. With improved graphics ends, and a variety of DOF to choose varied.
descriptionHtml:
ENB NEXT GENERATION
---------------------------------------------------------
-------------------NEWS:
---------------------------------------------------------
- Next Generation 3.0 Ready!!!!
List Changes:
-Enb 114
-New enbbloom
-New enbeffectprepass
-Four Presets: Vivid, Balanced, Cinema, Dark Nights best results.
-Only Dark Dungeons used for ENB, realistic lighting & RevampedExteriorFog removed
[url=http://theradikmeri.minus.com/m609Ngo0o/1g]GALLERY ENB NEXT GENERATION 3.0 [/url] 
Vivid
[URL=http://minus.com/loAHrE6D5RarP][IMG]http://i.minus.com/joAHrE6D5RarP.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbvP6VG9dySG1E][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbvP6VG9dySG1E.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Balanced
[URL=http://minus.com/lPeNxFLcdgTAC][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jPeNxFLcdgTAC.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lW7W4cZ2sichZ][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jW7W4cZ2sichZ.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Cinema
[URL=http://minus.com/l5g5z6YeJQpxz][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j5g5z6YeJQpxz.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lZgmyCyrSKVNs][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jZgmyCyrSKVNs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Darker Nights
[URL=http://minus.com/lQ98vQ35kuFkO][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jQ98vQ35kuFkO.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbvwdWkaiLaoXA][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbvwdWkaiLaoXA.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Install:

Copy files skyrim folder.
(d3d9.dll, enbbloom.fx, enbeffect.fx, effect.txt, enbeffectprepass.fx, enbpalette.bmp, enbseries.ini)
Copy Data files in folder skyrim/data: 
(Dark Dungeons for ENB)
!!!Important!!! Active:
-
-Dark Dungeons for ENB
---------------------------------------
---------------------------------------
Testing the new Matso enbloom and enbeffectprepass of one of my configs, if I like the result, I\'ll update my settings.
VIVID Test:
[URL=http://minus.com/lvlsEyOCAewsa][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jvlsEyOCAewsa.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
.......................History News......................................

NEW UPDATE ENB HOLLYWOOD NEXT GENERATION 2,5!!!!!
Gallery Screenshots:
[url=http://minus.com/mGkFoloT/69g]GALLERY ENB NEXT GENERATION V2.5 [/url] 
ENB BASED 0,113 KAGE
List of changes:
-Updated to version enb 113 with Sun Rays
-Remove RemoveAmbientInteriorFog and Add Dark Dungeons for ENB
-Changes Volumetricfog
-Changes Sun & Sky.
-4 types of presets with custom settings
PRESETS:
VIVID: Bright colors, lively evenings, nights bright and highly visible, Bokeh Dof
[URL=http://minus.com/lEAw4OBNUCDc8][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jEAw4OBNUCDc8.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Balanced: Balancing between the color and at night, Bokeh Dof
[URL=http://minus.com/lbbmLiwNLNuDr6][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbbmLiwNLNuDr6.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Cinema:Type color palette cinema, with adjustments in the nights., Less Dof. Film Grain Optional.
[URL=http://minus.com/lLI1nBYw4i6i][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jLI1nBYw4i6i.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Darker Nights: Dark Nights, poor visibility at night, Very Less Bokeh
[URL=http://minus.com/ldmJXILpRg08l][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jdmJXILpRg08l.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Presets SSAO quality medium have default. Use the ENB Customizer 2.1 or change it manually.
Recommended:

DLC OFFICIAL TEXTURES or install the texture pack for bodies, armor that you like.

Enhanced Night Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=85

Enhanced Distant Terrain
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1598

More Dynamic Shadow:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8262

ALTERNATE SUNGLARE:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1653

CLARALUX:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605

ENB Customizer v2:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17400

History News:
-NEW UPDATE ENB NEXT GENERATION 1.8!!!!
Gallery Screenshots:
[url=http://minus.com/mmU9oFybr/1g]GALLERY ENB NEXT GENERATION V1.8 [/url] 
--------------------------------------------------------------------
REMEMBER ENDORSE ;)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

author: TheRadik
